DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate the change in sodium fluorescein staining, as a sign of dry eye, during six weeks of treatment with FID 115958D or Refresh Liquigel.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Evaluation of an Investigational Lubricant Eye Gel (FID 115958D)
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis of dry eye NaFl Corneal staining sum score â‰¥ 3 in either eye Current use of a lubricant eye gel or ointment at least once per week (over the previous month) No contact lenses wear throughout the study period Must not have had punctal plugs inserted within 30 days preceding enrollment
